metadata.name: From Darkness to Light
metadata.description:
“In your light, I learn how to love.  
In your beauty, how to make poems.  
You dance inside my chest where no one sees you,  
but sometimes I do, and that sight becomes this art.”  
― Rumi

Human intention is to work towards the victory of light over darkness, good over evil, and knowledge over ignorance.

4500 x 6341 px, JPEG (14.4 MB)  
Hand-drawn over a time span of 15 days using procreate on the Ipad
